author: Jamie Gross
title: Implementing a Frontend with Micro-Components
desc: Micro-components have huge potential for large scale, enterprise applications. See how I implemented my first one using Vue.js.

author: John Yeary
title: Multiple Java Persistence API (JPA)
desc: Java Persistence API (JPA) is a great technology for combining the power of Java and data persistence. The specification goes a long way from the days of using EJB 1.0 for data management, but still comes with some limitations.

author: John Baldwin
title: Get on the Event Bus: Vue.js
desc: Getting on the event bus bandwagon may sound like a bad idea, you can look up articles with Event Bus in the title and easily find articles that conjure up scary phrases like "anti-pattern" and "avoid at all costs".

author: Jamie Gross
title: Angular-Custom Form Validation
desc: Custom validators can be quite tricky, but are extremely useful. An example of a fairly common requirement is password matching.

author: Jamie Gross
title: Angular-Inputs and Outputs
desc: Simple and easy to follow tutorial of how to effectively user Input and Output features in Angular.

author: Jamie Gross
title: Angular-Subjects
desc: BehaviorSubjects are a great way to pass data back forth between a large number of components.
